content: this stylish crocheted take on the ubiquitous slouchy beanie is limitlessly customizable it will look fantastic in fun hand-dyed yarn or sophisticated in semi-solids plus since the hat is worked from the top down you can effortlessly create a fit that suits your style smaller or larger with just a little or lots of slouch and because you re working top down gauge is not important use what we used for materials or create your own combinations want to make a slouchy crocheted hat using river city yarns exclusive yarns check them out here www rivercityyarns com click on the shop online button thanks to all the test knitters who helped us finalize and finesse this hat
